bibl.bibl: Eaton, Alfred Edwin. 2012. An account of the petrological, botanical and zoological collections made in Kerguelen’s Land and Rodriguez during the transit of Venus expeditions 1874–75. Cambridge: Cambridge University Press. [Reprint of Royal Society of London. 1879. Philosophical Transactions of the Royal Society of London. An account of the petrological, botanical, and zoological collections made in Kerguelen’s Land and Rodriguez during the Transit of Venus expeditions carried out by order of Her Majesty’s government in the years 1874–75. London: G. E. Eyre & W. Spottiswoode.]
